description: Visual effects, animations, and flashy UI components

components.name: Aceternity SVG Mask Effect
components.description: Novel SVG mask text effect with dynamic visual transformations and creative animations - perfect for artistic displays, creative headers, and unique visual experiences
components.styleNotes: Advanced SVG mask effect with creative visual transformations - ideal for artistic applications, creative agencies, and unique visual experiences that need standout effects.

components.name: Aceternity Sticky Scroll Reveal
components.description: Sticky scroll text reveal effect with progressive content disclosure and smooth animations - perfect for storytelling, content reveals, and engaging scroll-based narratives
components.styleNotes: Advanced sticky scroll effect with text reveal animations - ideal for storytelling websites, content narratives, and engaging scroll-based user experiences.

components.name: Aceternity Animated Tabs
components.description: Dynamic animated tabs with smooth background animations and content switching - perfect for interactive interfaces, dashboards, and engaging content organization with visual flair
components.styleNotes: Advanced animated tabs with dynamic background animations - ideal for interactive dashboards, content organization, and modern interfaces requiring engaging tab transitions.

components.name: Aceternity Wobble Card
components.description: Interactive card effect that translates and scales on mousemove with smooth animations - perfect for feature cards, product showcases, and engaging interactive elements
components.styleNotes: Interactive card component with mousemove animations and wobble effects - ideal for feature cards, product showcases, and adding engaging hover interactions to content.
